content.p: Engineering. Architecture. Design. Follow us on LinkedIn Get ready to shape the real world. Our Faculty of Engineering includes six high-performing departments that work closely together to benefit you. Great minds don't think alike and this spirit of collaboration is essential to engineers, architects and designers. Here you get the space, support, skills and connections to revel in the real world. You'll design the places of tomorrow and create cutting-edge tools and technologies. Solve real world challenges, turn research into reality and help make a greener planet spin a little smoother. "The University of Nottingham has changed my life. The community is amazing here. My experience allowed me to expand my network and enabled me to secure a job at a respected and influential company." â€” Agnes Nagy, Electronic Engineering MEng alumni (Electronics Design Engineer at Nordson) Find a course or PhD Visit our campuses in person Multi-disciplinary research impact Where are they now?
